Summary: light in distant eastern sky moving around a great deal with no pattern
divs: sighting detailswe're trying to get video but it's quite a distance. breaking out the telescope now. was hoping to find locals on line to help me confirm or at least identify the object. no such luck. my home faces due east. the object was to the east in the sky, it was quite a distance but bright. there is a telephone pole about 1\4 block east and object seemed to be about 1\2 - 3\4 hight of tele pole. don't know how to calculate height unless i had a distance so probably no help. i'm going back out to look again. it's been there a while now. moving what seems to be (visually 2" or more in each direction, based on distance, it'd be moving a lot up, down and to both sides) with no pattern and very quickly. does not appear to be a plane. it wouldn't be moving like that if it were.
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around May 9th 2009
